# HUD::SET_PED_HAS_AI_BLIP_WITH_COLOUR

## Summary
Registers a passed ped with the CScriptPedAIBlips with a colour override

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** onOff
* **INT** colour

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
color: see SET_BLIP_COLOUR
